sentences.sContent: Lancashire hotpot: This is another British dish that uses lamb, named after the Lancashire region in the middle of the UK.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lancashire hotpot: This is another British dish that uses lamb, named after the Lancashire region in the middle of the UK.
sentences.sCn: 兰克希儿郡火锅 ：这又是一道用羊羔肉做的英式菜肴，以英国中部的兰克希儿地区命名。

sentences.sContent: Lancashire hotpot is a dish consisting essentially of meat, onion and potatoes left to bake in the oven all day in a heavy pot and on a low heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lancashire hotpot is a dish consisting essentially of meat, onion and potatoes left to bake in the oven all day in a heavy pot and on a low heat.
sentences.sCn: 兰开夏火锅主要有肉、洋葱、土豆组成，这些食材要在一个非常重的锅里面低火烹制一天方可食用。

sentences.sContent: Fine, I know a good hotpot place in the downtown area, food there is pretty spicy too.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fine, I know a good hotpot place in the downtown area, food there is pretty spicy too.
sentences.sCn: 好，我知道商业区有一个吃火锅的好地方，那里的食物也很辣。

synos.tran: 牛肉，羊肉，马铃薯合敦的菜肴

trans.tranOther: a piece of electrical equipment with a small container, used to boil water
